paragraphs: The annual "Heroes Day 2025" festival will take place at the Výstaviště exhibition complex. True heroes of the capital - police officers, firefighters, and emergency medical service workers - will demonstrate their skills to the visitors. The Czech Army will also participate in the event.
The event will take place on Saturday, September 27, from 11:00 to 17:00.
Admission is free, everyone is welcome.

Guests will be able to learn about the work of emergency services in Prague and inspect special equipment, including from the inside. Demonstrations are also planned - evacuation of the injured by helicopter, work of mounted police, dog handlers with dogs, and much more.
The detailed program of the promotion is available here.
